attributes.action: Implant Chris Mole, MP, with a sense of humour and give him more work to do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This humourless man has stepped forward to request that Jeremy Clarkson be dismissed from Top Gear.
I find the idea of government ministers getting involved in media inspired attacks on celebrities disgusting. They should have much better things to do with their time.
He obviously needs:
a) A sense of humour, or
b) More real work to do, or
c) Both of the above
Can we please help this poor man.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
